TextBlock.Text: OKALIS: Friends, I am pleased to announce that I was successful in my attempt to make contact with the stranger!
SENNETTI: How did it go? Were you able to get a closer look at them?
NESIA: Were they appreciative of your attempt to return their item?

OKALIS: It went well, yes, and maybe! I avoided hiding this time and, upon returning to the campsite, they slowly approached me, apparently having noticed that I was holding their tablet. I held it out for them to take and, upon grabbing it, they promptly turned around and left.

OKALIS: As for their appearance, I confirmed what I observed previously. In addition, their teeth seemed to be sharp to a point, their body was covered in gray skin, and they did have small recesses in their skull where eyes might normally reside.
AZOLLA: Let us hope that we made a good first impression. They may no longer decide to return now that they have their tablet.
NESIA: It appears that they may still be somewhat scared of us, if they fled that quickly.
